vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!locked[msg.sender]); // check if the user is already withdrawing
        locked[msg.sender] = true; // lock the user from re-entry
        
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // zero out user balance before external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // external call to withdraw funds
        locked[msg.sender] = false; // unlock the user after external call is complete
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#8-16):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_8.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!locked[msg.sender]); // check if the user is already withdrawing
        locked[msg.sender] = true; // lock the user from re-entry
        
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // zero out user balance before external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // external call to withdraw funds
        locked[msg.sender] = false; // unlock the user after external call is complete

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!locked[msg.sender]); // check if the user is already withdrawing
        locked[msg.sender] = true; // lock the user from re-entry
        
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // zero out user balance before external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // external call to withdraw funds
        locked[msg.sender] = false; // unlock the user after external call is complete
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#8-16):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) patch_8.sol#14

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
